arts.ttl: St. Pauli defend Nikola Vasilj after mistake: “He’s saved our asses plenty of times.”
arts.sum: FC St. Pauli defender Hauke Wahl was quick to defend keeper Nikola Vasilj after a bad mistake from the Bosnian international on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Bo Henriksen: “It was not a good game”
arts.sum: Mainz momentarily climbed to fifth place after a 2-0 win over St. Pauli. But their coach isn't too pleased about the performance.

arts.ttl: Super sub Jae-Sung Lee inspires Mainz to crucial win over St. Pauli
arts.sum: Second-half substitute Jae-sung Lee scored and assisted in a victory that strengthens Mainz's push for European qualification. Despite St. Pauli's pressure, Mainz's defence held firm, with Anthony Caci coming close to breaking the deadlock just before half-time.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Alonso writes history, wins for Mainz and Augsburg, Hecking draw in Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen are back to winning ways after two goalless draws. Meanwhile, Mainz secure back-to-back wins. Wolfsburg avoid defeat with a late goal against Bochum.

arts.ttl: Bo Henriksen endorses Mainz goalkeeper Robin Zentner for German national team
arts.sum: In the midst of commenting on his starting keeper's bout with illness, Mainz 05 trainer Bo Henriksen took the opportunity on Friday to endorse Robin Zentner for the German national team.

arts.ttl: Mainz 05 vs. St. Pauli preview: Die Nullfünfer targeting back-to-back victories
arts.sum: Mainz will attempt to claim back-to-back victories when they welcome St. Pauli to the Mewa Arena for Saturday’s Bundesliga fixture.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. St Pauli - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and St Pauli, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
